Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.interfaces

Interface WorkerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkerServiceImpl
@Service public interface WorkerService
Service interface for managing worker operations.

      Parameters:
      workerId - the worker's ID
      comment - the access comment
      Returns:
      the response DTO indicating access status
